name: v0.8.1.7
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_detekt", version = "0.8.1.7")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_detekt",
    sha256 = "e9f9ad54ff3e7ef9d651ba531a6e93bfeae350a30bb224087144cb120ee97ce4",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_detekt-0.8.1.7",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/releases/download/v0.8.1.7/bazel_rules_detekt-v0.8.1.7.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Remove space in username by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/184


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.8.1.5...v0.8.1.7

name: v0.8.1.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_detekt", version = "0.8.1.3")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_detekt",
    sha256 = "9a34120d0f82d5406c6b981b6a9e1c402f2f028757dfafce7861fae0588c7429",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_detekt-0.8.1.3",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/releases/download/v0.8.1.3/bazel_rules_detekt-v0.8.1.3.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Bump actions/setup-java from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/170
* [CI] Split things up using test matrix by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/173
* Bump bazelbuild/setup-bazelisk from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/172
* Update Bazel to 7.0.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/174
* Update Detekt to 1.23.5 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/171
* Add Bazel version to presubmit by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/175
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 5 to 6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/176
* adding support for creating detekt baseline file by @mohammadkahelghi-grabtaxi in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/177
* Update Bazel to 7.2.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/178
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 6 to 7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/179
* Update Bazel versions by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/181

## New Contributors
* @mohammadkahelghi-grabtaxi made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/177

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.8.1.2...v0.8.1.3

name: v0.8.1.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_detekt", version = "0.8.1.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_detekt",
    sha256 = "a5ae68f2487568d2c4145a8fc45da096edaaaed46487fb3d108ffe24b31d99da",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_detekt-0.8.1.2",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/releases/download/v0.8.1.2/bazel_rules_detekt-v0.8.1.2.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update MODULE.bazel version to 0.8.1.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/167
* Update metadata.template.json to use Artem's working email by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/166
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/168
* Fix typo in toolchains.bzl by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/169


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.8.1.1...v0.8.1.2

name: v0.8.1.1
body:
Notable changes in this release:
- Bzlmod support is here! A few breaking changes had to be made to better support Bzlmod. For more information please refer to https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/151#issue-1920018491
- There is a new `detekt_test` rule that was added so that these rules can be invoked using `bazel test //...` https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/149
- The included detekt version was updated to 1.23.1. https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/157

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_detekt", version = "0.8.1.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_detekt",
    sha256 = "946891973dc13bf68b8c0d3e8c7c1967dd1f8642481276934cbe77e9c362c84c",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_detekt-0.8.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/releases/download/v0.8.1.1/bazel_rules_detekt-v0.8.1.1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update Bzlmod presubmit to use //... by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/163
* Update rules_java to 5.5.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/164
* Run only the /detekt/... tests during BCR presubmit by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/165


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.1.1

name: v0.8.1
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_detekt",
    sha256 = "593f88e7ecae3eddfad85ae6c04f855e257a43c7ecdf2e1b0e88c045f40e4d33",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_detekt-0.8.1",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/releases/download/v0.8.1/bazel_rules_detekt-v0.8.1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Enable Dependabot by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/136
* Bump actions/setup-java from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/140
* Bump actions/cache from 2.1.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/139
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.3.1 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/138
* Bump bazelbuild/setup-bazelisk from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/137
* Bump actions/cache from 3.2.4 to 3.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/141
* Bump actions/cache from 3.2.5 to 3.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/142
* Bump actions/cache from 3.2.6 to 3.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/143
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/144
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.4.0 to 3.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/145
* Update rules_java, rules_jvm_external, bazel_skylib, bazel by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/147
* Move rule attributes to global variable by @davidkurkov in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/148
* Add detekt-test target by @davidkurkov in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/149
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/150
* Add support for Bzlmod by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/151
* Add BCR configurations by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/152
* Pin Bzlmod rules_detekt_dependencies by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/153
* Update the README with Bzlmod customization information by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/154
* Add back missing WORKSPACE test dependency by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/156
* Fix detekt_version macro documentation by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/155
* Update Detekt 1.22.0 -> 1.23.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/157
* Use detekt_test in the README since the detekt rule was renamed by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/158
* Integrate BCR release CI scripts by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/159
* Add missing ci.bazelrc by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/160
* Don't build manual targets on CI by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/162

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/140
* @davidkurkov made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/148

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.1

name: v0.7.0
body:
```python
rules_detekt_version="0.7.0"
rules_detekt_sha="16a85a2b92e3f708a64c7f73fa6bb2d87018bd968ee4bb2b576cb43e48ab293b"
```

## What's Changed
* Update Detekt 1.21.0 → 1.22.0 by @artem-zinnatullin in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/135
* Switch persistent worker from Protocol Buffers to JSON by @arturdryomov & @artem-zinnatullin https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/133 (removes dependency on `rules_proto`! Please check README if you're on Bazel prior to 5.1.0)
* Update rules_jvm_external from 4.2 -> 4.4.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/131

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.1
body:
```python
rules_detekt_version="0.6.1"
rules_detekt_sha="6d532a25caa0d63d142848e7b0d4eb3b2ac89253646b68c1c94b7ec7371bdc1c"
```

## What's Changed
* Update rules_proto to 4.0.0-3.20.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/123
* Update Bazel from 5.0.0 -> 5.3.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/127
* Switch to Zulu JDK, setup-bazelisk, and buildifier_prebuilt by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/128
* Update Detekt from 1.19.0 to 1.21.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/pull/130


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
```starlark
rules_detekt_version="0.6.0"
rules_detekt_sha="44912c74dc2e164227b1102ef36227d0e78fdbd7c7359868ae13424eb4f0d5c2"
```

### Changes
* Bazel 5.0.0 support
* Updating our `rules_jvm_external` and `rules_java` repositories
* Using the worker implementation targets provided by Bazel

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
```starlark
rules_detekt_version="0.5.0"
rules_detekt_sha="65203efa2c7f252a9fbeba0abe651cd32c316858d3dbad550a5a34cf48bbe404"
```
### Changes
* Detekt wrapper powering the rule was rewritten from Kotlin to Java. While this is painful, it removes the `rules_kotlin` dependency and associated issues with upgrading to new Kotlin versions (which lead to clashing with Detekt bytecode).
* Enable worker multiplex execution. This should improve execution times by a margin — see #109 for the comparison.

name: v0.4.0
body:
```starlark
rules_detekt_version="0.4.0"
rules_detekt_sha="a39020fba766258cdcdbf8f99487304775bd6e43b8b3b967b9961d48b2581fe3"
```

### Changes

* Support for latest Bazel (4.0.0) and Detekt (1.15.0) versions. Thanks @Bencodes!
* Support for [Detekt plugins](https://detekt.github.io/detekt/extensions.html#let-detekt-know-about-your-extensions).

```starlark
rules_detekt_version="0.3.0"
rules_detekt_sha="b1b4c8a3228f880a169ab60a817619bc4cf254443196e7e108ece411cb9c580e"
```

Both workspace and package declarations were changed — please take a look at [the `README.md`](https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt#usage) for new ones.

* The default Detekt version is 1.7.4. It’s also possible to use a custom one.
* More Detekt options, see [the documentation](https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_detekt/blob/master/docs/rule.md).
* Bazel persistent workers support.

name: v0.2.0
body:
```python
rules_detekt_version = "0.2.0"
rules_detekt_sha = "089c4cb35d4f711aa5a6bb8c109950cfcc07327ac6956275971ec401992fccd6"
```

Changelog:

- Add pull_request trigger to GitHub Actions CI (#17)
- Refine the readme file (#16)
- Switch to Bazelisk (#19)
- Refactor rule declaration (#18)
- Add Maven Central URL for downloading Detekt (#21)
- Fix invocations with multiple input files (#22) 

❤️ Thanks to these contributors:

- @arturdryomov
- @Kernald
- @artem-zinnatullin
